solution_line_template: Frank has ${total_one_dollar_value} in one dollar bills because {one_dollar_bills_count} x {one_dollar_value} = <<{one_dollar_bills_count}*{one_dollar_value}={total_one_dollar_value}>>{total_one_dollar_value}

Frank has ${total_five_dollar_value} in five dollar bills because {five_dollar_bills_count} x {five_dollar_value} = <<{five_dollar_bills_count}*{five_dollar_value}={total_five_dollar_value}>>{total_five_dollar_value}

Frank has ${total_ten_dollar_value} in ten dollar bills because {ten_dollar_bills_count} x {ten_dollar_value} = <<{ten_dollar_bills_count}*{ten_dollar_value}={total_ten_dollar_value}>>{total_ten_dollar_value}

Frank has {total_money} dollars in total because {total_one_dollar_value} + {total_five_dollar_value} + {total_ten_dollar_value} + {twenty_dollar_bill_value} = <<{total_one_dollar_value}+{total_five_dollar_value}+{total_ten_dollar_value}+{twenty_dollar_bill_value}={total_money}>>{total_money}
Frank bought {pounds_of_peanuts} pounds of peanuts because {money_spent} / {cost_per_pound} = <<{money_spent}/{cost_per_pound}={pounds_of_peanuts}>>{pounds_of_peanuts}
He eats {average_pounds_per_day} pounds a day on average because {pounds_of_peanuts} / {days_in_week} = <<{pounds_of_peanuts}/{days_in_week}={average_pounds_per_day}>>{average_pounds_per_day}
